categories: Category:LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures

nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures – Complete Season One

LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures – Complete Season One is a home video compilation of the first season of the animated television series LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures. First announced by StarWars.com on September 9, 2016, it was released on December 6, 2016.
The Complete Season One consists of two discs featuring all thirteen episodes plus some bonus material.
Both the Blu-ray and DVD editions include:
